Plot: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.
Title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
Writer: Joe Shuster (character created by: Superman), Jerry Siegel (character created by: Superman), Christopher Reeve (story), Lawrence Konner (story), Mark Rosenthal (story), Lawrence Konner (screenplay), Mark Rosenthal (screenplay)
Actors: Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Jackie Cooper, Marc McClure
